titles.title: Recognizing and congratulating ACT, Inc. on 50 years of service to the Nation.
Recognizing and congratulating ACT, Inc. on 50 years of service to the Nation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary:
Congratulates ACT, Inc. on 50 years of service to this country. (ACT is a nonprofit organization offering educational and workplace measurement and research services.)
Congratulates ACT employees, directors, and members of state organizations for their dedication to assisting people in this country and around the world in their pursuit of educational and workforce success.
